subject: Message to Simsonn store owner.
description_text:
Hello Simsonn,

It feels like you’re saving up for Christmas, right? But what if you didn’t
need to save to enjoy the season? Did you know your store Simsonn could
actually fund your Christmas?

I understand the self-doubt about making sales but between now and the
festive season, you can earn more than you expect with just a few smart
fixes. It could completely turn your store around.

Would you like me to walk you through how to hit your year-end goals in the
months ahead?
